articles.title: U.K. police catch terrorism suspect Daniel Khalife, who escaped from a London prison - CBS News
articles.description: Khalife, 21, was on the run four days before a massive search managed to nab him in Chiswick in west London.
articles.content:
A former soldier who escaped from a London prison while awaiting trial on terrorism charges was captured Saturday, police said.
